pages.text: Mining is your game. It's almost a miracle that you're only now coming around to the idea of upgrading not only your tools, but your mining proficiency in general. This ring will grow with your abilities.

pages.title: Fusion Recipe
pages.text: Infuse it with [Magenta Ink](entry://magic/ink) in a [Color Picker](entry://magic/color_picker) to increase your Mining Speed.
